description: General term for living organisms.
example: The zoo has many different types of animals.

description: Structures where people live or work.
example: The tallest building in the city is the skyscraper.

description: The condition of the atmosphere at a specific time and place.
example: The weather is sunny today.

description: A device that tells time.
example: The clock on the wall shows the current time.

description: A piece of land used for growing flowers or vegetables.
example: She spends her evenings in the garden.

description: Art form that uses sound and rhythm.
example: He enjoys listening to classical music.

description: A natural flowing watercourse.
example: The river flows through the center of the town.

description: Objects used to make a room suitable for living or working.
example: The living room is furnished with modern furniture.

description: Systematic knowledge derived from observation, study, and experimentation.
example: She is studying environmental science.

description: A large natural elevation of the Earth's surface.
example: They climbed the mountain last summer.

description: A device used to capture images or videos.
example: He took a picture with his camera.

description: A tool for writing or drawing.
example: She used a pencil to sketch the drawing.

description: A place where goods are bought and sold.
example: They went to the market to buy fresh vegetables.

description: A small community in a rural area.
example: He grew up in a beautiful village.

description: A device for receiving broadcast signals and displaying images.
example: We watch the news on television every evening.

description: A large area covered chiefly with trees and undergrowth.
example: They went for a hike in the forest.

description: A device used for communication.
example: She called her friend on the telephone.

description: An opening in a wall that allows light and air to enter a room.
example: She opened the window to let some fresh air in.

description: Heat and light produced by burning.
example: They sat around the fire and roasted marshmallows.

description: A vast body of saltwater that covers most of the Earth's surface.
example: They went sailing on the ocean last summer.

description: The area above the Earth where clouds, the sun, moon, and stars are seen.
example: The sky was clear and blue today.

description: A wide way that leads from one place to another, usually paved.
example: They drove down the road towards the city.

description: A piece of furniture for sitting.
example: He sat on the chair at the dining table.

description: Items worn to cover the body.
example: She bought new clothes for the party.

description: The planet on which we live; the third planet from the sun.
example: The Earth revolves around the sun.

description: A written or printed work consisting of pages.
example: He enjoys reading books in his free time.

description: A round fruit with red or green skin and a crisp flesh.
example: She bit into a juicy apple.

description: An electronic device that stores and processes data.
example: He uses a computer for work and entertainment.

description: The reproductive structure found in flowering plants.
example: She picked a beautiful flower from the garden.

description: A set of keys used for typing on a computer.
example: She typed the document using the keyboard.

description: A female parent.
example: His mother cooked dinner for the family.

description: A male parent.
example: Her father taught her how to ride a bike.

description: A building for human habitation.
example: They live in a small house near the beach.

description: An opening in a wall that allows light and air to enter a room.
example: She opened the window to let some fresh air in.

description: An institution for educating children.
example: She goes to school from Monday to Friday.

description: A piece of furniture with a flat top and legs.
example: They sat around the table for dinner.

description: A four-wheeled motor vehicle used for transportation.
example: He drove his car to work every day.

description: A piece of furniture for sitting.
example: He sat on the chair at the dining table.

description: A piece of furniture used for studying or working.
example: She sat at her desk and did her homework.

description: A device for giving light.
example: She turned on the lamp to read in the dark.

description: A large plant with a trunk and branches.
example: The tree provided shade on a hot day.

description: A writing instrument.
example: He used a pen to write the letter.

description: Thin sheets used for writing, printing, or drawing.
example: She wrote a note on a piece of paper.

description: A drinking container made of glass.
example: He drank water from a glass.

description: A domesticated mammal commonly kept as a pet.
example: She took her dog for a walk in the park.

description: A small domesticated carnivorous mammal.
example: The cat curled up on the couch.

description: A device used for communication.
example: He answered the phone when it rang.

description: A flexible container used for carrying items.
example: She packed her belongings in a bag.

description: A spherical object used in various sports and games.
example: They played soccer with a ball.

description: A timepiece worn on the wrist.
example: He checked the time on his watch.
